text: Onon, ki jagonagii Allohro inkor kardand va pajomʙarasro nofarmoni kardand, amvolasonro xarc mekunand va ʙa musrikon va gumrohon medihand, to mardumro az rohi Alloh ʙozdorand. Molhojasonro xarc xohand kard va hasrat xohand ʙurd, mexohand, ki nuri Allohro xomus kunand, sipas ʙo dasti mu'minon maƣluʙ mesavand. Va kofironro dar cahannam gird meovarand
